title: The 2017 Movie Draft
description:
We’re drafting again, and this time we’ve got a doozy of a year. Chris Ryan rejoins Sean and Amanda to select their favorites from one of the most memorable movie years in recent memory. 

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Chris Ryan
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
